name: Operator
description: The Operator is designed for close range engagements. High speeds allow it to incessantly pursue its targets and upon exiting Phase it\'s able to deal massive burst damage.
obtaining: Farm the Malware 96, 98 targets with a Sov and a Rena fit with some plasma resistance gear
tips-builds: You can farm many Umbra Targets with this hull that includes the lvl 3 gear for the Valrayvn, Fit the Operator with, 4 Paroxysm Cannon lvl 1, along with 1 lvl 3 Phase Drain Buffer, and 1 lvl 3 Harmonic ChaseThruster, then to finish off fit 1 lvl 1 Node Armour, and 1 lvl 1 Mesh Screen
author: Viper Controll
